title: Natur-Drogeriet
cleaned_text: WE BELIEVE IN COMPLEXITY HISTORY BASED ON HERBS QUALITY - OUR TOP PRIORITY Four chosen products Shortcuts to a better life [](/products) A WIDE SELECTION We have a wide selection of many interesting products - dietary supplements, herbal medicines, herbal teas, dried herbs, oils, etc. [](/articles) ARTICLES Our extensive knowledge is described in a number of articles - and we are happy to share them with you! [](/what-are-hpmc-capsules) Article What are HPMC capsules? Hydroxypropyl methylcellulose - a real tongue twister! That's why we use the acronym HPMC when we talk about our new capsules... [](/the-84-series) Article The 84 Series - a bunch of great teas! In 1984, a number of teas saw the light of day: the 84 Series. Originally, the teas were made to give people in general access to the health-promoting effects of various herbs.
